Reviews.Title: Works great, but had a couple problems
Reviews.Author: sophia
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about buying something so expensive online, but I bought it anyway. The phones works great and it was registered with straight talk like it was supposed to be. It actually got here a week from the day I ordered it. There was a chip on the bottom right hand corner when i got it but it's not too bad. It would have been nice to know beforehand. The only major problem is that one of the speakers is broken. The sound is still really good, like it plays twice as loud out of the working speaker, so it doesn't really bother me. The phone was supposed to be refurbished though so nothing should be messed up.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Michael Scott Maxwell
Reviews.Content: Having had a few concussions, my memory isn't exactly great so my TBI doctor recommended I get a smart phone to help me remember my appointments on the calendar function. this has been a great help as well and may of the other gadgets and stuff I am figuring out with the phone as well. I avoided the smart phone band wagon for quite a bit now and am happy to have this as my first smart phone.  Can't beat the service prices as well, way better than verizon or sprint.

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4s used
Reviews.Author: Ady
Reviews.Content: Its fantastic has few scratches but nothing big works great sucks when it came on the box had no manual or at least some instructions but over all is great.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: adam leamons
Reviews.Content: It really does meet what I thought it would and there very few things that are wrong with this device.
